content.text:
Here is my response following the given format and rules:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Instructing Students Individually and in Groups

1. Lecture-based instruction
   - Present information clearly to the whole class
   - Use visual aids and examples to enhance understanding
   - Encourage questions and participation

2. Small group discussions
   - Divide class into small groups of 3-5 students
   - Assign topics or problems to discuss
   - Rotate between groups to facilitate and guide conversations

3. Hands-on demonstrations
   - Show students how to perform tasks or experiments
   - Allow students to practice under supervision
   - Provide feedback and correction as needed

4. Individual instruction
   - Work one-on-one with students who need extra help
   - Tailor explanations to each student's learning style
   - Use personalized examples and practice exercises

5. Collaborative projects
   - Assign group projects to promote teamwork
   - Guide students in dividing tasks and responsibilities
   - Facilitate group presentations of completed work

6. Interactive technology
   - Utilize educational apps and software for individualized learning
   - Implement online quizzes and games for group engagement
   - Use digital whiteboards for collaborative problem-solving

</OUTPUT_TEXT>
